-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | A library to handle messages in the OSC protocol
--   
@package osc
@version 1.0.0.2


module Sound.OSC
type Timestamp = Word64
data OSC
Bundle :: Timestamp -> [OSC] -> OSC
Message :: String -> [Datum] -> OSC
data Datum
String :: String -> Datum
Int :: Int32 -> Datum
Float :: Float -> Datum
Blob :: ByteString -> Datum
instance Show Datum
instance Show OSC


module Sound.OSC.Parser
osc :: Parser OSC
